featured.headline: 6 days left to lock in the lowest TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 rates
featured.summary: Super Early Bird pricing for TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ends February 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT. That means you have just 6 days left to secure up to $680 of ticket savings....

secondary_1.headline: Sam Altman would like to remind you that humans use a lot of energy, too

secondary_2.headline: Microsoft’s new gaming CEO vows not to flood the ecosystem with ‘endless AI slop’
